capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Dudley and apparently his lineage is quite interesting. From what I've found, he had a condition called maculogy which affects the retina of the eye. It's a pretty rare condition, but it seems to be a part of who he was.
capsules_submitted.reply: amazing! so, it seems like we already know about the lineage and maculogy of vernon, and now dudley is being compared to him in those aspects.
